nodes.bodyText: nit: construct WildcardMatcher inside OpenDistroSecurityFilter to fully encapsulate implementation details (whether it is implemented as WildcardMatcher or differently is internal to OpenDistroSecurityFilter). Move logging of immutableIndices to the OpenDistroSecurityFilter as well.
Can deleted test be moved to OpenDistroSecurityFilterTest (create if if necessary)?
I have migrated all the tests
Please create a follow up PR/issue to remove final from IndexResolverReplacer and mock IndexResolverReplacer.
If its okay, I will make the change here itself.
Yes, should be fine assuming there are no concerns removing final from IndexResolverReplacer.
nit: not sure that this and the other comment is necessary.
